info.title: ZEDEDA IAM Service
info.description: ZEDEDA Identity and Access Management (IAM) Service helps you securely control access to zedcontrol resources. You use IAM to control who is authenticated (signed in) and authorized (has permissions) to use resources. ZEDEDA IAM Service helps you set up users and roles, and shows you how to protect your resources with role-based access control (RBAC). It also shows how to connect to other identity services to grant external users access to your enterprise resources.

get.description: Query the AAA profile records.

400.description: Bad Request. The API gateway did not process the request because of invalid value of filter parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. The API gateway did not process the request because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource. The request header has either no authorization details or an authorization that has been refused.

403.description: Forbidden. The API gateway did not process the request because the requestor does not have edge-node level access permission for the operation or does not have access scope to the project.

500.description: Internal Server Error. The API gateway experienced an unexpected condition. Specific error condition is indicated in error codes.

504.description: Gateway Timeout. The API gateway did not receive a timely response from an upstream microservice it needed to communicate with in order to complete the request.

post.summary: Get AAA mode of the user
post.description: Get the AAA mode of the user. AAA mode can be authentication and authorization with zedcontrol as identity provider or authentication (and optionally authorization) with external identity provider. Oauth2 is supported for external authentication protocols.

403.description: Forbidden. The API gateway did not process the request because the requestor does not have edge-node level access permission for the operation or does not have access scope to the project.

409.description: Conflict. The API gateway did not process the request because this IAM role record will conflict with an already existing IAM role record.

500.description: Internal Server Error. The API gateway experienced an unexpected condition. Specific error condition is indicated in error codes.

504.description: Gateway Timeout. The API gateway did not receive a timely response from an upstream microservice it needed to communicate with in order to complete the request.

AAAFailureResponseLoginCause.title: Reason why authentication failed, this is more detailed than should be passed on to external clients

AAAFailureTokenRefresh.title: The token did not get refreshed for a specific reason. Supplies original token in the response

policies.title: BEGIN: Only valid when a certain verbosity level is requested

userId.title: BEGIN: Only valid when Cause == OK

policies.title: BEGIN: Only valid when Verbose is requesed

AAA_Frontend_LoginResponseCause.title: - EXCEPTION: Some exception has occurred on the server

verbosePolicy.title: How verbal should the response be

AAA_Frontend_LoginWithPasswordRequest.description: User either a combination of (username, realm) or (usernameAtRealm) to specify login details
AAA_Frontend_LoginWithPasswordRequest.title: Login request

userId.title: BEGIN: Only valid when Cause == OK

enterpriseId.description: Parent enterprise ID of the authorization profile

name.description: User defined name of the profile. Profile name is unique within an enterprise. Name can't be changed once created

active.description: Mark this profile as active. Only one profile can be active in a given enterprise

defaultRoleId.description: Default Role ID to associate with the profile

title.description: User defined title for the profile. Title can be changed anytime

next.description: Page details of the filtered records

CrudContent.title: Content, with a type encoded either as protobuf or json

queryToken.title: The unique id of the query

position.title: The index of the first result

size.title: The number of results returned, could be less than the requested size

total.title: The total number of result items for this query

orderBy.description: OrderBy helps in sorting the list response

totalPages.description: Total number of pages to be fetched.

Cursor.description: Cursor helps in filtering the various list response like edge-app bundle list, model list, bundle list etc.
Cursor.title: Cursor is used as filter in list operation.

timeZone.description: Preferred time zone of the user

LastLoginTime.description: Last login time of the user
LastLoginTime.title: Operational Status to be returned to CLI/UI

LastLogoutTime.description: Last logout time of the user

allowedEnterprises.description: Permitted list of enterprises with their associated roles

next.description: Page details of the filtered records
Page details of the filtered records

policyName.description: User defined name of the docpolicy. Name cannot be changed once created

policy.description: User defined name of the docpolicy. Name cannot be changed once created

name.description: User defined name of the enterprise. Once enterprise is created, name can’t be changed

azureSubId.description: Azure subscription ID tied to this enterprise

title.description: User defined title for the enterprise. Title can be changed any time

realms.description: List of realms associated with the enterprise

next.description: Page details of the filtered records

roleScope.description: OIDC scope to fetch application role

curr.description: Current Database version of the record

createdAt.description: The time, in milliseconds since the epoch, when the record was created.

updatedAt.description: The time, in milliseconds since the epoch, when the record was last updated.

ObjectRevision.description: ObjectRevision store the user details, who has doent the necessary operation like Create Operation or update operation
ObjectRevision.title: ObjectRevision is used to store the user information.

PolicyScope.title: Scope of the permission, similar to Unix file system

name.description: User defined name of the realm. Name cannot be changed once created

enterpriseId.description: Enterprise ID of the enterprise where the realm is to be created

title.description: User defined title of the realm. Title can be changed anytime

next.description: Page details of the filtered records

name.description: User defined name of the role. Name cannot be changed once created

title.description: User defined title of the role. Title can be changed anytime

RoleState.description:
Values for this needs to match the const defined in libs/database/datamodel.go for
backward compatibility.

next.description: Page details of the filtered records

Summary.description: Summary is used to store the Summary details
Summary.title: Summary is used to store the Summary details

UserState.title: General well being of the user

ZcOpsStatus.description:
- OPS_STATUS_PENDING: In rare cases, system may not start operation when it was requested. Client will be notified that operation is PENDING
 - OPS_STATUS_ONGOING: system will start the operation, but at the time response was generated, operation is still ONGOING.
 - OPS_STATUS_COMPLETE: Even if the result of the operations may result in failure, but the OpsStatus will marked COMPLETE for almost all cases.
ZcOpsStatus.title: ZedCloud internal operation status

ec.title:
Enumrated error code, describes more granular numerical
value than just httpStatus

details.title: Field captures string description of details

ZsrvErrorCode.description:
- zMsgErrorNone: common validation errors
 - IncompleteData: message had fields that weren't filled in
 - InvalidData: message contained the field that wasn't expected
 - FunctionUnsupported: this feature unavailable on this version of device
 - InvalidFieldFormat: message contained the field that wasn't correctly formatted
 - JsonFmtError: Marshal / Unmarshal errors
 - DataBaseConnection: generic DB error
ZsrvErrorCode.title: ZedCould internal error code

operationType.title:
Describes one of the operations type : possible values
                        Read/Delete/Create/Update/List

operationStatus.title: if this is log running job

objectKind.title: zedcloud object kind on which the operation was performed

objectId.title: Unique value identifies the object that was operated on

objectRevision.title:
object revision post the operation, note Read operation
doesn't change the revision

user.title: the operation is performed on behalf of this user

httpStatusMsg.title: summary of the error in text format

error.title:
one or more errors will be set if the operation failed
i.e. httpStatusCode != 2xx
